Function set_log_function¶

  • Defined in File PyLogging.h

Function Documentation¶

PyObject *set_log_function(PyObject *dummy, PyObject *args)¶

Sets the logging function to the provided specification.

Parameters
  • dummy: the dummy object
  • args: the args provided (should be one callable logging function)
